result.title: Help needed in the problem
result.content: The problem statement is following : We are required to transport a package using trucks. We are given package size and trucksize (every truck has equal capacity). The package can be repeatedly broken into half i.e 6 can be broken into 3-3 and 3 can be broken into 1 and 2. We were required to code a program which could tell the minimum amount of trucks required for given package size and trucksize.
